sample_sales_data.description: Sales transactions data containing order information, products sold, pricing, and regional data
sample_sales_data.business_context: This table tracks all sales orders. Use 'price' column for sales amount/revenue. Use 'quantity' for units sold.

key_columns.customer_id: Reference to customer who placed the order
key_columns.price: Price per unit (use this for sales amount/revenue calculations)
key_columns.order_date: Date when the order was placed
key_columns.region: Geographic region where the sale occurred (North, South, East, West)

common_queries: Top sales by revenue: ORDER BY price DESC
Sales by region: GROUP BY region

sample_customer_data.description: Customer master data including contact information and demographics
sample_customer_data.business_context: Contains customer profiles and contact details

sample_inventory_data.business_context: Tracks current stock levels and product details
